definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
to resist/to obstruct/to hinder/to keep off/to block (a blow)/to get in the way of/cover/gear (e.g. in a car's transmission)

sentences.english: Blob head door stop promotes headache drug.
sentences.chinese: Blob頭型門擋能夠提升頭疼藥的效果。

sentences.english: This Silly brand doggy doorstop is as practical as it is cute.
sentences.chinese: 這個傻傻的小狗門擋很可愛也很管用。
